item.title: Migrate Azure VM Across Regions Using Azure CLI and Bash Script
item.description: Migrating an Azure Virtual Machine (VM) from one Azure Region to another can be necessary for several reasons, including disaster recovery, optimizing performance, or reducing latency. While Azure provides various options for replication and failover, one of the most efficient ways to migrate a VM manually involves creating a Snapshot of the VM Disks, copying [â€¦] The article Migrate Azure VM Across Regions Using Azure CLI and Bash Script was originally published on Build5Nines.
